org.sql: SELECT spree_taxons.* FROM spree_taxons INNER JOIN spree_taxonomies ON spree_taxons.taxonomy_id = spree_taxonomies.id WHERE spree_taxonomies.store_id = "$1" AND spree_taxons.id IN ("$2", "$3") ORDER BY spree_taxonomies.position, spree_taxonomies.created_at

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_taxons.* FROM spree_taxons INNER JOIN spree_taxonomies ON spree_taxons.taxonomy_id = spree_taxonomies.id WHERE spree_taxonomies.store_id = "$1" AND spree_taxons.id IN ("$2", "$3") ORDER BY spree_taxonomies.position, spree_taxonomies.created_at LIMIT 1
